displayName.japanese: グリッサンドロ・グライド

description.english: Look up glissando in a dictionary, you'll know what to do Agent... HINT: start from the marked key
description.german: Schlagen Sie 'Glissando' im Wörterbuch nach, Agent. HINWEIS: Beginnen Sie bei der markierten Note.
description.french: Cherchez glissando dans un dictionnaire... ASTUCE : commencez par la clé marquée.
description.italian: Cerca glissando sul dizionario, Agente, saprai cosa fare SUGGERIMENTO: Inizia dalla chiave segnata.
description.koreana: 사전에서 글리산도를 찾아보면 무엇을 해야 할지 알 거야, 에이전트... 힌트: 표시된 열쇠부터 시작하세요
description.spanish: Busca 'glissando' en el diccionario PISTA: comienza desde el punto marcado
description.schinese: 翻字典查查滑音的意思，你就知道怎么做了，特工……提示：从标记的琴键开始
description.tchinese: 查查「滑音」是什麼意思，你就知道下一步該怎麼做了，特務……提示：從標記的琴鍵開始
description.russian: Найдите слово 'глиссандо' в словаре и поймете, что делать, агент СОВЕТ: начните с отмеченного ключа
description.japanese: グリッサンドロとは何かを調べてみると良い。どうすべきかわかるはずだ…ヒント：マークの付きの鍵から始める
description.brazilian: Procure glissando em um dicionário. Você verá o que fazer, Agente... DICA: Comece na tecla marcada

description.english: Overflow the sink a second time
description.german: Das Waschbecken ein zweites Mal überfluten
description.french: Faites déborder l'évier une deuxième fois.
description.italian: Fai traboccare di nuovo il lavandino
description.spanish: Inunda el desagüe por segunda vez
description.tchinese: 再一次把洗手台裝滿水
description.japanese: シンクを二度目に氾濫させる
description.brazilian: Faça a pia transbordar pela segunda vez

description.english: Shoot the gun range target 100 times
description.german: 100-mal auf die Zielscheibe des Schießstands schießen
description.french: Tirez 100 fois sur la cible à portée d'arme.
description.italian: Colpisci il bersaglio del poligono 100 volte
description.spanish: Dispara al blanco del campo de tiro 100 veces
description.japanese: 射撃場でターゲットを100回撃つ
description.brazilian: Atire no alvo do estande de tiro 100 vezes

displayName.russian: Ну и ну, ну и ну!

description.french: Faites “bong” 10 fois rapidement.
description.italian: Emetti un 'boing' 10 volte velocemente
description.spanish: Haz 10 veces seguidas el sonido de 'boing'
description.russian: 10 раз быстро издать звук 'ну и ну'
description.japanese: 「ピョン」という音を素早く10回出す
description.brazilian: Faça um som de 'boing' 10 vezes rapidamente

description.english: Deliver a surprise to Onyx and you'll have an ally for life
description.german: Onyx ein Überraschungsgeschenk machen und eine lebenslange Verbündete gewinnen
description.french: Apportez une surprise à Onyx et vous aurez un allié pour la vie.
description.italian: Consegna una sorpresa a Onyx e sarà tuo amico per la vita
description.koreana: 오닉스에게 깜짝 선물을 배달하면 평생의 동맹이 생길 겁니다
description.spanish: Dale una sorpresa a Ónice y tendrás un amigo para siempre
description.schinese: 送一份惊喜给欧尼克斯，从而收获一位一辈子的盟友
description.tchinese: 為歐尼克斯送上一份驚喜，這隻貓就會成為你的終生盟友
description.russian: Сделайте Оникс подарок и заведете верную подругу на всю жизнь
description.japanese: オニクスにサプライズをお届け。終生の味方になってくれるぞ
description.brazilian: Entregue uma surpresa para a Ônix e você terá uma aliada para a vida toda

description.english: Show us your DJ skills, scratch a record for 10 seconds
description.german: DJ-Talent beweisen und 10 Sekunden lang eine Schallplatte scratchen
description.french: Montrez-nous vos talents de DJ en scratchant pendant 10 secondes.
description.italian: Mostraci le tue abilità da DJ, scratcha un disco 10 volte
description.koreana: DJ 기술을 보여주세요, 레코드를 10초 동안 긁으세요
description.spanish: Demuestra tus habilidades como DJ y pincha un disco durante 10 segundos
description.schinese: 让我们见识下你的 DJ 技能，搓一张碟 10 秒
description.tchinese: 展現你的 DJ 天分，刮唱片 10 秒鐘
description.russian: Продемонстрируйте свое мастерство диджея, перемещая пластинку в течение 10 секунд
description.japanese: DJスキルを見せつけろ。レコードを10秒間スクラッチする
description.brazilian: Mostre suas habilidades de DJ. Faça scratch em um disco por 10 segundos

description.french: Faites à l'agent A une coiffure “électrique”.
description.italian: Fai all'Agente A una pettinatura 'elettrizzante'

description.spanish: Ponle un peinado electrizante a Agent A
description.schinese: 给特工 A 做一个“电力十足”的发型
description.tchinese: 為特務 A 設計一個「電到爆」的髮型
description.russian: Сделать агенту А наэлектризованную укладку волос
description.japanese: Agent Aを「しびれる」ヘアスタイルにさせる
description.brazilian: Dê ao Agente A um penteado 'eletrizante'

displayName.japanese: キャッチ・アンド・リリース

description.english: Release your latest catch... HINT: not Ruby though
description.german: Ihren letzten Fang freilassen ... TIPP: Aber nicht Ruby.

description.koreana: 최근에 잡은 포로를 풀어주세요... 힌트: 루비는 빼고요
description.spanish: Libera a tu última captura PISTA: no es Ruby
description.schinese: 把最近抓到的小傢伙放走……提示：不是指露比
description.tchinese: 把剛剛抓到的小傢伙放走……提示：不是指露比

description.english: Collect the fish bones a second time

description.english: Find every spider web in Agent A

description.english: Give Günther (the crazy Norwegian bird) hiccups
description.german: Günther (dem verrückten norwegischen Vogel) einen Schluckauf verpassen
description.french: Donnez le hoquet à Günther (l'oiseau fou de Norvège).
description.italian: Fai venire a Günther (il pazzo uccello norvegese) il singhiozzo
description.spanish: Haz que a Günther (ese pájaro noruego chiflado) le entre hipo
description.schinese: 让甘特（那只疯狂的挪威鸟）打嗝
description.tchinese: 讓剛特（那隻瘋狂的挪威鳥）打嗝

description.brazilian: Dê soluço a Günther (o pássaro norueguês maluco)

description.english: The old phone in the shoe trick eh!? Find a shoe phone

description.french: Ah, le vieux truc du téléphone dans une godasse... Trouvez une chaussure-téléphone.
description.italian: Il vecchio trucco spionistico del telefono a scarpa, eh? Trovane uno
description.koreana: 신발 속에 오래된 전화기를 넣어 놓는 속임수죠!? 신발 전화기를 찾으세요

description.tchinese: 把大哥大放在皮鞋裡？老套！找到一支皮鞋大哥大
description.russian: Старый трюк с телефоном в туфле?! Найти телефон-туфлю
